structure.unit: Sec. 11-2173. - NO STOPPING OR STANDING ZONES.

law.text: When signs are erected giving notice thereof, no person shall at any time stop, stand, or park a motor vehicle with the areas designated as "no stopping or standing" zones. Stopping or standing shall be unlawful in such zones, as designated in official Traffic Schedule No. 14, "No Stopping or Standing Zones."
